title: Kurumi-tic☆Miracle
original_name: くるみちっく ☆ ミラクル
sinopse:
About a girl named Kurumi who helps her grandfather run the family antique shop and also likes Naoki, a boy from the same school. One day she finds a ring which made her pet hamster talk and gave her other special powers and now Naoki seem to be more interested in her... or the ring??

(Source: MU)
